newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Unibanco still ING hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Unibanco still ING hold.

text.p: -- ING Barings said it was maintaining its hold rating on Brazilian private bank Unibanco, but noted that there is an opportunity for profit-taking in the short term.
-- The bank's report takes into account an upcoming offer of American Depositary Receipts (ADRs) backed by Unibanco shares by Brazil's Central Bank.
-- "We are maintaining our hold recommendation on Unibanco considering the limited profitability expected for the next two years and concerns regarding the ADR issue," it said in a report.
